title: [Unturned 3.14.2.0] 更新记录
author: lichi2050
txt_content:
本帖最后由 lichi2050 于 2016-1-30 14:36 编辑 

Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/news/?appids=304930
Unturned Forum: http://unturned-forum.com/threads/3-14-2-0-update-notes.4805/
部分翻译: http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-548504-1-1.html
3.14.2.0 Rocket: http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-543521-1-1.html
You can now explore the waters with nautical vehicles! PEI and Washington have spawn points for several of each new transport, so all you need to do is hunt them down and launch without sinking. Similarly to cars/aircraft you can expand on the existing ones with in-game buildables, or create your own custom sailing contraptions using mods! The documentation and workshop have been updated to accommodate boats and other floating vehicles. 
你现在可以驾驶航海载具探索(我比较喜欢征服)深海水域！PEI 和 Washington（华盛顿）地图都有两个航海载具的生成点，你需要找到它们并在它们没下沉前发动. 与于车辆/飞行载具你可以修改游戏内已存在的模型，或者使用Mod制作属于你的航海载具！游戏资料和创意工坊已经更新可以完美的适应这些新的载具.

Additions/添加
Added Otter. [ID 96] 加入载具 Otter(水獭/水上飞机). [ID 96] Added Runabout. [ID 97] 加入载具 Runabout(汽艇). [ID 97] Added Jetski. [IDs 98-105] 加入载具 Jetski(水上摩托艇). [IDs 98-105] Added amphibious qualities to the APC. APC装甲车加入了水陆两栖功能.Added keybinds for roll left/right and pitch up/down. 添加横滚 左/右 和 俯仰 上/下 快捷键. Added more Arena centers on PEI/Alpha Valley. PEI/Alpha Valley 地图加入更多的竞争场中心.Added buildables/throwables stats and Fortified achievement. 加入buildables(建筑量)/throwables(抛掷/扔掉) 数据统计以及Fortified(巩固) achievement. Added loading info to debug text.debug 界面加入加载信息.

Improvements/优化
Improved map UI scaling. 优化地图UI（界面）缩放.Improved Arena to show player count instead of groups. 优化竞争场显示玩家数量而不是小队数量.Improved direct connect to work with URLs with more than 2 dots. 优化直连可使用超过2点的URLs（连接）Improved navmesh cutting performance with shipping containers. 优化navmesh(导航网格/俗称寻路系统)影响游戏性能.Improved grenade/rocket to have configurable effects/range. 优化手榴弹/火箭可设置效果/范围.Improved vehicle command to fill health/fuel. 优化补充车辆汽油指令.Improved aircraft to support more than 2 rotors.优化飞行载具可支持大于2个旋翼.
Tweaks/调整

Tweaked campfire to be destroyable with gun/melee. 调整篝火可被 枪械/近战武器破坏.Tweaked aircraft health higher. 调整飞行载具的耐久值.Tweaked scrap per sheet. 调整废铁.Tweaked Arena winner time longer. 调整竞争场胜者时间.Tweaked Arena field speed slower. 调整竞争场内速度缓慢.Tweaked experience on Arena lower, but raised stamina.调整竞争场经验值（略低），但提高耐力.
Fixes/修复

Fixed plane/heli exit distance and position. 修复飞行载具出口方位与距离定位.Fixed entering slowly moving aircraft. 修复进入缓慢移动的飞机.Fixed interacting with vehicles while dead. 修复死亡时与车辆互动. Fixed snow blend when flying upward in aircraft. 修复飞机载具向上飞行时的积雪.Fixed placing multiple door/gate in same spot. 修复在同一个地方摆放多个门（不同类型）.Fixed dead players included in Arena list. 修复竞争场名单内含死亡玩家.Fixed max accepted XZ car travel distance on server.修复服务器车辆X/Z 方向的最大行驶接受距离. 

如有错误，还望指出。
